column1: Local Foods////It is way too cold! What is up with Houstonians making it so cold...which in turn makes the heat feel worse when you go outside again. Recently
column3: i moved outside at the Upper Kirby location to thaw out and was absolutely fine in the shade. It's just unnecessary
column5: and wastes energy. Figure out a way to focus the cold air into the kitchen area
column6: which is presumably why it's kept low throughout the restaurant.
